page.title: 13HOME-LIFE KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content: All homes have Television & Radio. Some families own Home Computers & Video recorders, a rapidly developing branch of home entertainment. We are a long way from cinema & theatre. Most people watch TV. Some occasionally eat out, frequent the local pub or take part in the many village socities & clubs. {Safety.}Some recent house break-ins have meant an increase in burglar alarms for more affluent looking houses. Also stronger doors & locks. In comparison with town life, fewer precautions are necessary & some windows doors & cars are left unlocked Children wander & play about each village fairly freely. Neighbours do excercise a supervising role because all children are known. Road Safety is necessary, of course, & children are taught it at home & school.
